Detailed Description

Implementation class of pincers.

vtkToolPincers is the class that implements the pincers tool, inside the scene. Contains methods for position control of the tool in the scene and collision detection. Pincers are composed of 3 pieces: 1 stick and 2 graspers (vtkPiece) Inherits vtkToolLaparascopy class

Member Function Documentation

void vtkToolPincers::Close (  ) 

Close the pincers moving piece actors.

Piece actors are transformed to perform tool closing Bounding boxes are recalculated.

void vtkToolPincers::SetOpening ( double  opening  )  [virtual]

Set the tool's aperture according with the value given in the "Aperture" parameter.

This function set the tool's aperture in function of the value given in the "Aperture" parameter. The aperture is established modifying the tool's mesh position. The "Aperture" parameter can take any value between "0" $ "1": "0" -> to close the tool "1" -> to open the tool

Reimplemented from vtkToolLaparoscopy.
